remarks: Condition for an atom to be covered by the join of two others. (Contributed by NM, 7-Feb-2012.)
statement:
atcvrj1x.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
atcvrj1x.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
atcvrj1x.c $e |- C = ( <o ` K ) $.
atcvrj1x.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
atcvrj2b $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ ( P e. A /\ Q e. A /\ R e. A ) ) -> ( ( Q =/= R /\ P .<_ ( Q .\/ R ) ) <-> P C ( Q .\/ R ) ) ) $.
